actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the modification of a pump station intake structure and discharge line of the Fort Fairfield, Maine, flood control project at full Federal expense.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Requires the Federal share of all design and construction costs associated with modifying a pump station intake structure and discharge line to prevent ice from interfering with pump operation at the Fort Fairfield, Maine, flood control project to be 100 percent.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the modification of a pump station intake structure and discharge line of the Fort Fairfield, Maine, flood control project at full Federal expense.
